28173e3b-a8e2-5ee5-8c51-8aa7bc6cc474.title: Acceptance Criteria - Samples, records and certificates shall be provided to the Superintendent at least 10 working days prior to bulk delivery.

822a0fd0-833b-55e3-9019-cd3499eb0395.title: • Plant stock for all plant species

d3639994-1bfd-59d9-9d68-fafa90bd79d0.title: Record of conformity - Records & Certificates uploaded to teambinder

63274200-6ef1-5524-ad00-ffa10e52219b.title: Following information shall be provided to the superintendent:

b5c6a740-bd78-52bd-852b-fd177d63569e.title: All wood mulch shall be supplied, delivered, handled and applied in accordance with AS 4454, and shall comply with Table 720.044

a616fd65-5b3a-58f5-9b88-49d3cd0a4226.title: Record of conformity - This ITP signed off

2e6c347f-fa8b-5bd0-8429-80a61163d1e1.title: Acceptance Criteria - Site mulch available from the chipping of on-site indigenous or non-weed vegetation shall be used where possible.

a38f97ba-777a-5d29-8aa8-17479bc348ba.title: Where imported topsoil is used, the topsoil must conform to the properties specified in Table 720.042

31aeef9d-5cf9-55d7-ac3e-284b701ba7d7.title: Record of conformity - This ITP signed off

aee2436b-7404-52bc-a1cb-c4edbbafdf14.title: Acceptance Criteria - Site topsoil shall be used wherever possible, in preference to imported topsoil.

8846a9c7-2588-5e80-a604-9424693b351d.title: Record of conformity - This ITP signed off

6963543c-5f5b-50b6-9620-7162d97ea5a9.title: Acceptance Criteria - Planting areas are to be set out to the location and shape specified in the landscape drawings.

03ab80de-2727-537a-92d4-37f4a8e449ca.title: Plant density requirements and planting offsets established in the plant schedule are to be adhered to.

dd048e3c-5394-517b-9dc4-b3938574765e.title: Plants shall be placed as shown on the drawings.

8707a4f4-1a1a-5457-96db-1058e5fba7d5.title: Record of conformity - This ITP signed off

9ab2a3a1-31c6-5128-b060-424bae51347e.title: Acceptance Criteria - Soil preparation shall be in accordance with Table 720.071

440c400c-d70f-5183-a382-926c42a3f908.title: Record of conformity - This ITP signed off

384cc5da-4f22-5d49-9561-fda40bc5e878.title: Acceptance Criteria - All ripping works shall conform to the requirements of Cl 720.07 (b).

9c27d07e-73e3-5300-938d-479429d2a881.title: Ripped areas of planting, individual tree planting and grassing are to be made available for inspection prior to mulching, planting or grassing, and shall not proceed until the Superintendent acknowledges requirements for ripping have been met.

d66f9bc0-d4f2-5208-9b87-bb040dd26519.title: Following subsoil preparation, topsoil shall be spread on planting areas and grassed areas. Topsoil shall not be compacted.

ba99bcd5-41e5-5331-b357-48dbca395e3a.title: Acceptance Criteria - All disturbed and/or not paved areas shall be topsoiled according to Section 204 of VicRoads Standard for Roadworks and Bridge works, to the following minimum depths:

7fc80a78-426d-5c91-9f14-37f4d769f571.title: • Verge, 50mm outer edge / 20mm when within 100mm of the edge of seal or asphalt surface treatment

bc600e57-ea2d-5895-8105-906c0c3cd612.title: • Tree and shrub plantation bed areas = 100mm

c91a5537-dbe6-5484-9222-64826ad09672.title: Prior to mulching, planting or grassing, area to be presented to Superintendent for approval.

08cc6052-c567-5314-bc4b-a03f87322eea.title: Record of conformity - This ITP signed off

2f150780-bf04-597d-b277-292da41febb4.title: Acceptance Criteria - Cultivation shall be undertaken to break soil down to a tilth with 80% of the volume composed of clods less than 50 mm in diameter

03dd073c-f89b-54c8-8201-e9972b0cf4f7.title: In areas where topsoiling or cultivation is not practicable, the Contractor shall submit alternative methods to achieve an equivalent result to the Superintendent for review.

07900e9c-aae5-5260-8f37-5fbee58bc64e.title: Vibrating plates shall not be used. Ensure the dry bulk density does not exceed the limits in Table 720.072

74901c0b-fdf6-51c7-9784-9618a42306f5.title: Record of conformity - This ITP signed off

d50cf9dd-0876-5126-a26c-97727a248ec7.title: Acceptance Criteria - After cultivation and trimming, the Contractor may lightly compress topsoil for stability on slopes.

meta.name: 2.6 - Bulk density of soils for planting and grassing

a1a04428-2288-5baa-82d8-6c279cf5dbb4.title: (iii) level with adjacent pavements, kerbs, pits and other structures.

08bd9cdc-5b05-5b4d-bf7a-2e795715420d.title: Record of conformity - This ITP signed off

3c9f9ac8-3b0f-5d78-9645-e3be694a8d09.title: Acceptance Criteria - The finished level of grassed areas shall be:

342980dd-cb34-5538-b179-82bea5c051fd.title: (ii) level with the bottom of fence plinths;

7751abf8-7db4-539c-8440-7a7a87baa738.title: (i) not higher than 125 mm below weep-holes or damp-proof courses in adjacent walls;

d90e1488-b879-57d8-8c51-7f0b07a5f6f4.title: The finished level of garden bed mulch and/or topsoil shall be tapered so that the finished mulch and/or topsoil levels meet flush with the adjacent surfaces.

2084f5b8-b3a8-5fda-bdf3-2e0e70fd5c8d.title: Record of conformity - This ITP signed off

fe71a042-e132-5c50-92dd-96507c2d1a1e.title: Planting holes shall be backfilled with friable topsoil free of debris, rocks and clods greater than 50 mm in diameter.

c2860a4f-0a83-5282-b14f-f325cdad045c.title: Acceptance Criteria - Holes in heavy soils or on batters shall be prepared so as to ensure adequate drainage.

32f632b2-887c-5999-a227-377a266f20d6.title: The Contractor shall install 2 metre diameter mulch rings around all Individual Tree Plantings.

7b15254d-edeb-5d77-ae31-fdceed69a8fa.title: Mulch depths in all situations shall be a minimum 75 mm and maximum 125 mm.

fb348c10-e768-50a7-ba29-0523ec4a0213.title: Mulch shall extend at least 1 metre beyond plant centres at the outer edges of all Planting Areas. If space does not permit this in median, separator or splitter-island planting, mulching shall extend to the back of kerb.

2a7497fd-e3c6-5fbf-a3ef-e031a435d7a8.title: Acceptance Criteria - Install wood mulch to all Planting Areas unless otherwise specified.

cea7360a-5985-53a0-9b1b-ef137df317f8.title: Record of conformity - This ITP signed off

c5cd3834-7351-537c-a198-b6e3a7d785a0.title: Frequency - Once installation of assets completed

c6327ac5-3c2e-5e31-992a-c71fcd714593.title: Acceptance Criteria - All disturbed areas shall be topsoiled and grassed, all areas to be cultivated to a minimum 50mm depth, and moistened prior to the application of grass seed and fertiliser.

48d6c7f4-5d0c-5535-b5d1-396ef1295732.title: A joint inspection of all grassed areas shall be carried out between the contractor and superintendent three months after sowing has taken place.

c7cba13c-bdd4-580e-936e-360f4d7a2edd.title: Acceptance Criteria - Grass seed shall be sown at minimum 100 kg/Ha (if drilled) or 200 kg/Ha (if broadcast), distributed evenly to achieve an even and dense grass cover.

6a041d29-7b60-59a0-85ab-89c4d429b9db.title: Germination rate shall be minimum 80% cover within 8 weeks and 95% cover within 3 months of sowing.

ac64c8ec-cb05-5d78-a4fb-84b2b75424c4.title: Record of conformity - This ITP signed off
